product_overview: BeLink is a modern Web3 Quest Platform enabling projects to engage communities through quests and users to discover projects, complete quests, earn XP, and climb leaderboards with secure wallet, email, and social authentication.
core_goals: Enable projects to create and manage quests with diverse task types for community engagement.
Provide users with a seamless experience to discover projects, complete quests, and earn rewards and XP.
Offer robust authentication and account linking via wallets, email, and social OAuth providers.
Deliver real-time verification of social media tasks to ensure genuine engagement.
Maintain a responsive, accessible, and consistent user interface across devices.
Ensure data security and privacy compliance including encrypted tokens and RLS policies.
key_features: Multi-provider Authentication System supporting wallet (Ethereum/Solana), email, and OAuth (Twitter/X, Discord, Telegram).
Comprehensive Quest Management with multi-step quests and multiple task types including social, download, form, visit, and learn/quiz tasks.
Project Management for registration, editing, discovery, and owner management.
Task Verification System enabling real-time verification of social media actions such as follows, joins, likes, retweets, and subscriptions.
User Dashboard with quest progress tracking, XP accumulation, leaderboard functionality, and profile management.
Responsive UI Components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS ensuring a polished and accessible design.
File Upload and Storage integration using Supabase for managing quest-related images and user avatars.
Social Media Integrations with APIs for Twitter/X, Discord, and Telegram to support task verification and engagement.
Onboarding and alert systems for user guidance and notifications.
Secure backend integration with Supabase database, storage, and serverless API routes supporting all platform functionalities.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in using wallet, email, or social OAuth providers and completes profile setup.
Projects are registered and managed by owners who create quests with multiple tasks for users.
Users browse projects and quests, participate by completing tasks, and submit completions for verification.
The system verifies task completions in real-time through social media API integrations and custom verification logic.
Users track their progress and earned XP on their dashboard and view rankings on leaderboards.
Users manage account settings including linked social accounts, wallets, and profile edits.
Projects and quests data are managed and updated via secure APIs and database transactions ensuring consistency and security.
validation_criteria: Authentication workflows support all providers securely and reliably with token encryption and error handling.
Quest and project creation forms validate inputs properly and persist data correctly in the database.
Real-time task verification accurately reflects user social media actions using API responses.
User dashboard and leaderboard data update correctly based on quest completions and XP calculations.
UI components render correctly and respond appropriately on different screen sizes and devices.
File uploads succeed securely and stored media are accessible where required.
All API routes are secured with proper authorization and input validation.
System adheres to privacy policies and complies with GDPR as stated in the documentation.
